    BnBStrategy - Class in com.pld.agile.model.strategy
    The BnBStrategy class implements the SolvingStrategy interface and solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using the Branch and Bound (BnB) algorithm.
    BnBStrategy() - Constructor for class com.pld.agile.model.strategy.BnBStrategy
    Constructs a new BnBStrategy instance with a fresh BranchAndBound solver.
    bound(Integer, Collection<Integer>) - Method in class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.TemplateTSP
    Method that must be implemented in subclasses of TemplateTSP.
    bound(Integer, Collection<Integer>) - Method in class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.TSP1
    Returns a trivial bound of 0 for the remaining cost from the current vertex.
    branchAndBound(int, Collection<Integer>, Collection<Integer>, Double) - Method in class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.tsp.TemplateTSP
    The core branch and bound algorithm for solving the TSP.
    BranchAndBound - Class in com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.bnb
    The BranchAndBound class implements a branch and bound algorithm to solve the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP).
    BranchAndBound() - Constructor for class com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.bnb.BranchAndBound
    Constructor for the BranchAndBound class.
